trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDZ409_02732_TODO_00<tab>Slay tigers and obtain their meat.
TEXT_STMBDZ409_02732_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the tiger meat to Masatsuchi.
TEXT_STMBDZ409_02732_MASATSUCHI_000_000<tab>Agh, a hunger like this I have never known before!
TEXT_STMBDZ409_02732_MASATSUCHI_000_001<tab>Ah, hello there. Would you mind if I asked something of you?
TEXT_STMBDZ409_02732_MASATSUCHI_000_002<tab>I would be ever so grateful if you saw fit to hunt a tiger or two on my behalf!
TEXT_STMBDZ409_02732_MASATSUCHI_000_003<tab>There's nothing better than a fine cut of tiger meat. What say you? Please, I am on the verge of starving!
TEXT_STMBDZ409_02732_MASATSUCHI_000_004<tab>In my mind I am already chewing on a most succulent chunk of the tastiest of tigers...

TEXT_STMBDZ409_02732_MASATSUCHI_000_011<tab>Oh my, it is truly magnificent. It has been too long since I last dined on tiger. I haven't been able to do much hunting ever since I was blinded in one eye during a battle twenty-five years ago.

TEXT_STMBDZ409_02732_MASATSUCHI_000_012<tab>The village chief at the time took me in and fed me. In return I promised to work the fields for him and the villagers. It is tiring work, but I know this meat will give me the strength to carry on.
TEXT_STMBDZ409_02732_MASATSUCHI_000_013<tab>My thanks once again for delivering this to me. I shall savor every single bite!
